steps.name: CypherCommand
commands:
with 4 as hexLength
match (o:esco__Occupation)
[token:whereClause]
unwind o.skos__altLabel as altLabels
with o, altLabels, hexLength, '0x' + right( o.uri, hexLength) as baseHexCode
with o, altLabels, hexLength, baseHexCode, toLower(apoc.text.hexValue( apoc.convert.toInteger(baseHexCode) + 1)) as replacementChars, left(right( o.uri, 36),36 - hexLength) as trimmedUri, 0 as zero
with o, altLabels, replacementChars, trimmedUri + right (replacementChars,hexLength ) as newUri
create (al:OccupationLabel:Resource {skos__prefLabel: altLabels, uri: "<<contentapiprefix>>/occupationlabel/" + newUri})
create (o)-[:hasPrefLabel]->(al)

match (o:esco__Occupation)
[token:whereClause]
with distinct o
with o, right( o.uri, 36) as trimmedUri
create (l:OccupationLabel:Resource {skos__prefLabel:
o.skos__prefLabel, uri:"<<contentapiprefix>>/occupationlabel/" + trimmedUri})
create (o)-[:hasPrefLabel]->(l)
